story.title: Blood On The Shore - Episode 1
story.storyDescription: When a man is found shot to death at a popular resort, all the evidence points to Trevor Bain. And ex-cop Helen Olsson must try to clear his name…
story.creator: web-uploader
story.postPaywallNotification: Oh snap! Is Trevor in trouble?! Read more of BLOOD ON THE SHORE to find out.

messages.text: Helen, please answer!
What’s up?
Trevor didn’t call me today.
And he never forgets my birthday.
Hmmm. That’s not like Trevor at all.
I’m really worried.
I just know something is wrong.
Well, I guess I’d be worried too…
If I didn’t hear from Chloe on my birthday.
See? You know what I mean.
And you know from being a cop that the police would never take me seriously…
If I called them this soon.
Yes, I’m afraid that’s true.
Especially now that he’s 18.
I know that he’s technically an adult in the eyes of the law
But to me he’s still my baby!
And I can tell when there’s something up with my son.
I get it. I feel that way about Chloe.
But I also know that he and Chloe have been putting in long hours at the lodge.
Maybe he got caught up in work.
Wait—did you call the lodge to see if Trevor was working today?
Yes! I’ve been calling and calling, but no one is answering!
That’s really strange.
It’s so frustrating. Do you know if Chloe is working there today?
She is. I’ll text her right now and ask her if she’s seen him.
Thank you!
I feel so helpless down here in Minneapolis.
If no one has heard from him by tomorrow, I’m driving up to Grand Marais.
Do you think I could stay with you?
Of course you can. You know you’re always welcome.
Thank you!! ❤️
We’ll get to the bottom of this.
I’ll text Chloe right now.
Helen immediately texts her daughter.
Chloe, have you seen Trevor?
Oh Mom!! You won’t believe what happened here.
I’m shaking!!
Everyone is in shock!
What?
Please tell me it has nothing to do with Trevor.
No! The owner of the lodge was found dead!
You mean Frank Cassidy?
Yes.
That’s terrible! Everyone loved that guy.
Did he have a heart attack or something?
No! Mom—he was murdered!
What?
He was found dead on the shore in front of the lodge.
He was shot to death.
There’s blood all over the rocks there.
That’s awful!
Why would anyone want to kill Frank Cassidy?
I don’t know. He was such a sweet man.
Oh God, people are crying.
They closed the restaurant.
The police are all over the place.
They’re questioning all the employees and guests.
Chloe!! Listen.
What Mom?
Is Trevor there?
No.
Mom.
What is it?
Trevor was supposed to be here two hours ago.
Oh my God.
Are you sure?
I’m sure.
And Mom, he’s always on time.
Always.
I texted him and texted him.
He never answered.
When they found Mr. Cassidy I forgot all about it.
But what if…
The two things are related??
Mom, I can’t breathe!
Chloe, I want you to calm down.
Take a deep breath.
It won’t help to panic.
What should I do?
What if he’s lying hurt somewhere?
Mom, there’s something I never told you about Trevor and me…
Now listen honey.
I want you to find one of those police officers right now.
Tell them that Trevor is missing.
And then get back to me.
OK Mom.
Helen gets chills up her back and arms.
She used to get that feeling when she was a cop,
Whenever she knew the news was going to be bad.
She picks up the phone, and dials her best friend’s number.
She needs to warn her—
Because if this were about her own daughter, Helen would want to know.
Hi Anna.
Oh Helen! Please tell me you found Trevor.
No Anna, not yet.
I talked to Chloe…and God, this is going to be hard to say...
But Trevor was supposed to work today
And he didn’t come in.
Oh my God!
Please don’t panic.
But Trevor is so reliable. You KNOW that!
I know. And there’s something else.
What?!
The owner of the lodge has just been found…murdered.
Murdered? But …
There is a stunned silence.
Frank…Frank Cassidy?
Yes.
Trevor mentioned him to me just the other day.
He said he was going to have to talk to Frank Cassidy about something.
And that it wasn’t going to be easy.
Do you know what it was?
No. He wouldn’t tell me.
Listen, Anna. Chloe is calling.
I’ll call you right back after I talk to her.
Okay. Talk soon.
And thanks.
Of course. We’ll get to the bottom on this.
Helen clicks on Chloe’s incoming call, disconnecting the call with her friend.
Mom! Oh my God.
Did you tell the police about Trevor?
Yes, and they’re sure Trevor is alive.
Well, that’s good news! What makes them so sure?
Mom, it’s not good.
They think Trevor killed Mr. Cassidy.
And they’re saying he’s on the run.
